hadiths.text: Shu'ba reported it with the same chain of transmitters. with she addition of these words:" I said to Qatada: Did you hear it from Anas? He replied in the affir- mative and added: We had inquired of him about it

chapter.ara-name: باب حُجَّةِ مَنْ قَالَ لاَ يَجْهَرُ بِالْبَسْمَلَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Proof Of Those Who Say That The Basmalah Should Not Be Recited Aloud
